exclamation.description: A word said by magicians when performing a magic trick.

noun.description: Language, typically in the form of gibberish, used to give the impression of arcane knowledge or power.
examples: I get so fed up with all the mumbo jumbo and abracadabra

origin: Late 17th century (as a mystical word engraved and used as a charm to ward off illness): from Latin, first recorded in a 2nd-century poem by Q. Serenus Sammonicus, from a Greek base.
